remarks: A lattice line (or atom) cannot majorize a lattice plane.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lplnnle2at.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lplnnle2at.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lplnnle2at.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lplnnle2at.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplnnle2at $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. P /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> -. X .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) $.
